com.beaglebuddy.mp3

Class MP3BaseID3v24

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.beaglebuddy.mp3.MP3BaseID3v23
      • com.beaglebuddy.mp3.MP3BaseID3v24
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MP3Base

    public class MP3BaseID3v24
extends MP3BaseID3v23

    This base class provides some underlying methods for working with an ID3v2.4 tag.

    See Also:
    MP3BaseID3v24

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ID3v24Tag id3v24Tag
      ID3v2.4 tag which holds all the information about an .mp3 file

    • Field Detail

      • id3v24Tag

        protected ID3v24Tag id3v24Tag
        ID3v2.4 tag which holds all the information about an .mp3 file

    • Constructor Detail

      • MP3BaseID3v24

        public MP3BaseID3v24()

    • Method Detail

      • hasV24Errors

        public boolean hasV24Errors()
        determines if the ID3v2.4 tag had any frame errors when it was read in.
        Returns:
        whether any invalid frames were encountered while reading in the ID3v2.4 tag from the .mp3 file.

      • getV24Errors

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getV24Errors()
        gets a list of any frame errors encountered while reading in the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Returns:
        a list of the frame errors that occurred while reading in the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag was valid and did not contain any errors, then an empty list is returned.

      • getID3v24Tag

        public ID3v24Tag getID3v24Tag()
        gets the ID3v2.4 Tag.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 Tag.

      • addV24Frame

        public ID3v24Frame addV24Frame(FrameType frameType)
        add an ID3v2.4 frame of the specified type to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        frameType - type of ID3v2.4 frame to add to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Returns:
        the new ID3v2.4 frame that was added to the ID3v2.4 tag.

      • getV24Frame

        public ID3v24Frame getV24Frame(FrameType frameType)
        finds the first ID3v2.4 frame in the ID3v2.4 tag with the specified ID3v2.4 frame id.
        Parameters:
        frameType - type of ID3v2.4 frame to search for.
        Returns:
        the first ID3v2.4 frame with the given ID3v2.4 frame id found in the ID3v2.4 tag, or null if no frame with the specified id can be found.

      • getV24Frames

        public java.util.List<ID3v24Frame> getV24Frames(FrameType frameType)
        finds all the ID3v2.4 frames in the ID3v2.4 tag with the specified ID3v2.4 frame id.
        Parameters:
        frameType - type of ID3v2.4 frames to retrieve from the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Returns:
        a list of all the ID3v2.4 frames with the given ID3v2.4 frame id that were found in the ID3v2.4 tag, or an empty collection of size 0 if no ID3v2.4 frame with the specified ID3v2.4 id can be found.

      • removeV24Frame

        public ID3v24Frame removeV24Frame(FrameType frameType)
        removes the first ID3v2.4 frame with the specified ID3v2.4 frame id from the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        frameType - type of type ID3v2.4 frame to remove from the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 frame in the ID3v2.4 tag with the given ID3v2.4 frame id that was removed, or null if no ID3v2.4 frame with the specified id was found.

      • removeV24Frames

        public java.util.List<ID3v24Frame> removeV24Frames(FrameType frameType)
        removes all the ID3v2.4 frames with the specified ID3v2.4 frame id from the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        frameType - type of ID3v2.4 frame to remove from the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Returns:
        a list of all the ID3v2.4 frames with the given ID3v2.4 frame id that were removed from the ID3v2.4 tag, or an empty collection of size 0 if no ID3v2.4 frames with the specified ID3v2.4 id could be found.

      • getV24Album

        protected java.lang.String getV24Album()
        finds the ID3v2.4 FrameType.ALBUM_TITLE text frame in the ID3v2.4 tag and retrieves the text field.
        Returns:
        the text field found in the ID3v2.4 FrameType.ALBUM_TITLE text frame. If no ID3v2.4 FrameType.ALBUM_TITLE text frame is found in the ID3v2.4 tag, then null is returned.

      • setV24Album

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24Album(java.lang.String album)
        adds an ID3v2.4 FrameType.ALBUM_TITLE text frame with the specified album to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 FrameType.ALBUM_TITLE text frame, then the existing frame's text is simply updated. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 FrameType.ALBUM_TITLE text frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        album - the name of the album on which the .mp3 song was released. The text is encoded using the UTF-16 character set.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 FrameType.ALBUM_TITLE text frame that was added/updated.

      • removeV24Album

        protected ID3v24Frame removeV24Album()
        removes the ID3v2.4 FrameType.ALBUM_TITLE text frame in the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 FrameType.ALBUM_TITLE text frame that was removed. If the ID3v2.4 tag does not contain an ID3v2.4 FrameType.ALBUM_TITLE text frame, then no frame is removed and null is returned.

      • getV24AttachedPicture

        protected AttachedPicture getV24AttachedPicture(PictureType pictureType)
        finds the ID3v2.4 FrameType.ATTACHED_PICTURE frame in the ID3v2.4 tag and retrieves the attached picture.
        Parameters:
        pictureType - one of the 21 allowable ID3v2.4 picture types.
        Returns:
        the attached picture found in the ID3v2.4 FrameType.ATTACHED_PICTURE frame. If no ID3v2.4 FrameType.ATTACHED_PICTURE frame is found in the ID3v2.4 tag, then null is returned.

      • getV24AttachedPictures

        protected java.util.List<AttachedPicture> getV24AttachedPictures()
        finds all the ID3v2.4 FrameType.ATTACHED_PICTURE frames in the ID3v2.4 tag and retrieves the attached picture for each frame.
        Returns:
        the attached pictures found in the ID3v2.4 FrameType.ATTACHED_PICTURE frames. If no ID3v2.4 FrameType.ATTACHED_PICTURE frames are found in the ID3v2.4 tag, then an empty list is returned.

      • getV24AttachedPictureFrame

        protected ID3v24Frame getV24AttachedPictureFrame(PictureType pictureType)
        finds the ID3v2.4 attached picture frame containing the specified picture type in the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        pictureType - one of the 21 allowable ID3v2.4 picture types.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 attached picture frame containing the specified picture type. If no ID3v2.4 attached picture frame with the specified picture type was found in the ID3v2.4 tag, then null is returned.

      • setV24AttachedPicture

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24AttachedPicture(AttachedPicture attachedPicture)
        adds an ID3v2.4 attached picture frame with the specified picture type to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 attached picture frame with the specified picture type, then the existing frame's attached picture is simply updated with the new picture. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 attached picture frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        attachedPicture - an attached picture containing the information about the image to be added to the ID3V2.4 tag.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 attached picture frame that was added/updated.

      • removeV24AttachedPicture

        protected ID3v24Frame removeV24AttachedPicture(PictureType pictureType)
        removes the ID3v2.4 attached picture frame with the specified picture type from the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        pictureType - one of the 21 valid ID3v2.4 picture types.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 attached picture frame with the specified picture type that was removed from the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag does not contain an ID3v2.4 attached picture frame with the specified picture type, then null is returned.

      • removeV24AttachedPictures

        protected java.util.List<AttachedPicture> removeV24AttachedPictures()
        removes all ID3v2.4 attached picture frames from the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 attached picture frame with the specified picture type that was removed from the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag does not contain an ID3v2.4 attached picture frame with the specified picture type, then an empty list is returned.

      • getV24AudioDuration

        public int getV24AudioDuration()
        finds the ID3v2.4 FrameType.LENGTH text frame in the ID3v2.4 tag and retrieves the text field. The text field is then converted to an integer and returned.
        Returns:
        the text field found in the ID3v2.4 FrameType.LENGTH text frame. If no ID3v2.4 FrameType.LENGTH text frame is found in the ID3v2.4 tag, or if the text field is not a valid integer, then 0 is returned.

      • setV24AudioDuration

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24AudioDuration(int duration)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        adds an ID3v2.4 FrameType.LENGTH text frame with the specified duration to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 FrameType.LENGTH text frame, then the existing frame's text is simply updated. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 FrameType.LENGTH text frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        duration - the duration (in seconds) of the song in the .mp3 file.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 FrameType.LENGTH text frame that was added/updated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the duration is less than 0.

      • removeV24AudioDuration

        protected ID3v24Frame removeV24AudioDuration()
        removes the ID3v2.4 FrameType.LENGTH text frame in the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 FrameType.LENGTH text frame that was removed. If the ID3v2.4 tag does not contain an ID3v2.4 FrameType.LENGTH text frame, then no frame is removed and null is returned.

      • removeV24AudioSize

        protected void removeV24AudioSize()
        does nothing. Since the LENGTH frame type was removed in ID3v2.4, this method is simply here to provide compatibility with its ID3v2.3 counter part.

      • getV24Band

        protected java.lang.String getV24Band()
        finds the ID3v2.4 FrameType.BAND text frame in the ID3v2.4 tag and retrieves the text field.
        Returns:
        the text field found in the ID3v2.4 FrameType.BAND text frame. If no ID3v2.4 FrameType.BAND text frame is found in the ID3v2.4 tag, then null is returned.

      • setV24Band

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24Band(java.lang.String band)
        adds an ID3v2.4 FrameType.BAND text frame with the specified band to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 FrameType.BAND text frame, then the existing frame's text is simply updated. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 FrameType.BAND text frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        band - the name of the band who recorded the song. The text is encoded using the UTF-16 character set.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 FrameType.BAND text frame that was added/updated.

      • removeV24Band

        protected ID3v24Frame removeV24Band()
        removes the ID3v2.4 FrameType.BAND text frame in the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 FrameType.BAND text frame that was removed. If the ID3v2.4 tag does not contain an ID3v2.4 FrameType.BAND text frame, then no frame is removed and null is returned.

      • getV24Comments

        protected java.lang.String getV24Comments(Language language)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        finds the song comments written in the specified language in the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the song comments are written in.
        Returns:
        the song comments written in the specified language. If no song comments written in the specified language could be found in the ID3v2.4 tag, then null is returned.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getV24CommentsFrame

        protected ID3v24Frame getV24CommentsFrame(Language language)
        finds the ID3v2.4 comments frame with the specified language in the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the song comments are written in.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 comments frame containing with the specified language. If no ID3v2.4 comments frame written in the specified language were found in the ID3v2.4 tag, then null is returned.

      • setV24Comments

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24Comments(Language language,
                         java.lang.String comments)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        adds an ID3v2.4 comments frame with the comments written in the specified language to the ID3v2.4 tag. The comments are encoded as a UTF-16 string in the ID3v2.4 comments frame. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 comments frame with the specified language, then this frame's comments are simply updated with the new one. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 comments frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the song comments are written in.
        comments - the comments about the song.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 comments frame that was added/updated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the comments are empty or contain only whitespace.

      • removeV24Comments

        protected ID3v24Frame removeV24Comments()
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        removes the english language song comments from the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 comments frame that was removed from the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag does not an english language ID3v2.4 comments frame, then null is returned.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • removeV24Comments

        protected ID3v24Frame removeV24Comments(Language language)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        removes the ID3v2.4 song comments written in the specified language from the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the song comments are written in.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 comments frame that was removed from the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag does not contain an ID3v2.4 comments frame with the specified language, then null is returned.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getV24Disc

        protected int getV24Disc()
        finds the ID3v2.4 FrameType.PART_OF_A_SET text frame in the ID3v2.4 tag and retrieves the text field. The text field is then converted to an integer and returned.
        Returns:
        the text field found in the ID3v2.4 FrameType.PART_OF_A_SET text frame. If no ID3v2.4 FrameType.PART_OF_A_SET text frame is found in the ID3v2.4 tag, or if the text field is not a valid integer, then 0 is returned.

      • setV24Disc

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24Disc(int disc)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        adds an ID3v2.4 FrameType.PART_OF_A_SET text frame with the specified size to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 FrameType.PART_OF_A_SET text frame, then the existing frame's text is simply updated. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 FrameType.PART_OF_A_SET text frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        disc - the disc number of the cd on which the song was released. It must be >= 1.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 FrameType.PART_OF_A_SET text frame that was added/updated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the disc is less than 1.

      • removeV24Disc

        protected ID3v24Frame removeV24Disc()
        removes the ID3v2.4 FrameType.PART_OF_A_SET text frame in the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 FrameType.PART_OF_A_SET text frame that was removed. If the ID3v2.4 tag does not contain an ID3v2.4 FrameType.PART_OF_A_SET text frame, then no frame is removed and null is returned.

      • getV24LeadPerformer

        protected java.lang.String getV24LeadPerformer()

      • setV24LeadPerformer

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24LeadPerformer(java.lang.String leadPerformer)
        adds an ID3v2.4 FrameType.LEAD_PERFORMER text frame with the specified lead performer to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 FrameType.LEAD_PERFORMER text frame, then the existing frame's text is simply updated. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 FrameType.LEAD_PERFORMER text frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag. On Windows machines, this field is called "Contributing Artist".
        Parameters:
        leadPerformer - the name of the lead performer on which the .mp3 song was released. The text is encoded using the UTF-16 character set.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 FrameType.LEAD_PERFORMER text frame that was added/updated.

      • removeV24LeadPerformer

        protected ID3v24Frame removeV24LeadPerformer()
        removes the ID3v2.4 FrameType.LEAD_PERFORMER text frame in the ID3v2.4 tag. On Windows machines, this field is called "Contributing Artist".
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 FrameType.LEAD_PERFORMER text frame that was removed. If the ID3v2.4 tag does not contain an ID3v2.4 FrameType.LEAD_PERFORMER text frame, then no frame is removed and null is returned.

If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 FrameType.LYRICIST text frame, then the existing frame's text is simply updated. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 FrameType.LYRICIST text frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        lyricist - the person(s) who wrote the lyrics to the song. The text is encoded using the UTF-16 character set.

If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 FrameType.CONTENT_TYPE text frame, then the existing frame's text is simply updated. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 FrameType.CONTENT_TYPE text frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        genre - the song's music type. That is, the type of music the song would be described as. The text is encoded using the UTF-16 character set.

      • getV24Rating

        protected int getV24Rating()
        finds the ID3v2.4 FrameType.POPULARIMETER frame in the ID3v2.4 tag and retrieves the rating field.
        Returns:
        the rating field found in the ID3v2.4 FrameType.POPULARIMETER frame. If no ID3v2.4 FrameType.POPULARIMETER frame is found in the ID3v2.4 tag, then 0 is returned.

      • setV24Rating

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24Rating(int rating)
        adds an ID3v2.4 FrameType.POPULARIMETER frame with the specified rating to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 FrameType.POPULARIMETER frame, then the existing frame's rating is simply updated. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 FrameType.POPULARIMETER frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        rating - the rating of the song. The rating is 1-255 where 1 is worst and 255 is best. 0 is unknown, or unrated.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 FrameType.POPULARIMETER frame that was added/updated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the rating is less than 0 or greater than 255.

      • getV24SynchronizedLyrics

        protected java.util.List<SynchronizedLyric> getV24SynchronizedLyrics(Language language)
        finds the synchronized song lyrics in the specified language in the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the song lyrics are written in.
        Returns:
        the list of the synchronized song lyrics in the specified language. If no synchronized song lyrics in the specified language were found in the ID3v2.4 tag, then null is returned.

      • getV24SynchronizedLyricsFrame

        protected ID3v24Frame getV24SynchronizedLyricsFrame(Language language)
        finds the ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame containing in the specified language in the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the synchronized song lyrics are written in.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame written in the specified language. If no ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame written in the specified language was found in the ID3v2.4 tag, then null is returned.

      • setV24SynchronizedLyrics

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24SynchronizedLyrics(java.util.List<SynchronizedLyric> synchronizedLyrics)
        adds an ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame with the specified english song lyrics to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame with the lyrics in english, then this frame's synchronized lyrics are simply updated with the new lyrics. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        synchronizedLyrics - the synchronized (english) lyrics to the song. The lyrics are encoded using the UTF-16 character set.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame that was added/updated.

      • setV24SynchronizedLyrics

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24SynchronizedLyrics(Language language,
                                   java.util.List<SynchronizedLyric> synchronizedLyrics)
                                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        adds an ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame with the specified song lyrics written in the given language to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame with the lyrics in the specified language, then the existing frame's synchronized lyrics are simply updated with the new lyrics. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag. The UTF-16 character set used to encode the lyrics.
        Parameters:
        language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the song lyrics are written in.
        synchronizedLyrics - a list of synchronized lyrics to the song. The lyrics must be in chronological order.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame that was added/updated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the synchronized lyrics are not sorted in ascending chronological order.

      • setV24SynchronizedLyrics

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24SynchronizedLyrics(Encoding encoding,
                                   Language language,
                                   java.util.List<SynchronizedLyric> synchronizedLyrics)
                                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        adds an ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame with the specified song lyrics written in the given language to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame with the lyrics in the specified language, then this frame's synchronized lyrics are simply updated with the new lyrics. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        encoding - the character set used to encode the lyrics. Only ISO 8859-1 and UTF-16 are allowed.
        language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the song lyrics are written in.
        synchronizedLyrics - a list of synchronized lyrics to the song. The lyrics must be in chronological order.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame that was added/updated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the synchronized lyrics are not sorted in ascending chronological order.

      • removeV24SynchronizedLyrics

        protected ID3v24Frame removeV24SynchronizedLyrics(Language language)
        removes the ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame written in the specified language from the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the synchronized song lyrics are written in.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame written in the specified language that was removed from the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag does not contain an ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame in the specified language, then null is returned.

      • getV24Text

        protected java.lang.String getV24Text(FrameType frameType)
        finds the ID3v2.4 text frame with the specified ID3v2.4 frame type in the ID3v2.4 tag and retrieves the text field from the ID3v2.4 frame.
        Parameters:
        frameType - one of the ID3v2.4 text frame types.
        Returns:
        the text field found in the ID3v2.4 text frame specified by the ID3v2.4 frame type. If no ID3v2.4 text frame with the specified frame type was found in the ID3v2.4 tag, then null is returned.

      • getV24TextAsInteger

        protected int getV24TextAsInteger(FrameType frameType)
        gets the text from a text frame and converts it to an integer.
        Parameters:
        frameType - ID3v2.4 text frame type.
        Returns:
        the text of a text frame as an integer. If no number has been specified or if the number is less <= 0, then 0 is returned.

      • setV24Text

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24Text(java.lang.String text,
                     FrameType frameType)
        adds an ID3v2.4 text frame with the specified text to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 text frame with the specified frame type, then the existing frame's text is simply updated. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 text frame with the specified frame type is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be added to the ID3v2.4 tag. The text is encoded using the UTF-16 character set.
        frameType - the type of ID3v2.4 text frame to add.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 text frame that was added/updated.

      • setV24Text

        public ID3v24Frame setV24Text(int n,
                     FrameType frameType)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        adds an ID3v2.4 text frame with the string value of the specified integer to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 text frame with the specified frame type, then the existing frame's text is simply updated. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 text frame with the specified frame type is added to the ID3v2.4 tag. The specified integer is converted to a string which is then stored in the text frame in the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        n - the integer whose value will be converted to a string and stored in a text frame in the ID3v2.4 tag. The text is encoded using the ISO 8859-1 character set.
        frameType - the type of ID3v2.4 text frame to add.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 text frame that was added/updated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the number n is <= 0.

      • setV24Text

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24Text(Encoding encoding,
                     java.lang.String text,
                     FrameType frameType)
        adds an ID3v2.4 text frame with the specified text to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 text frame with the specified frame type, then the existing frame's text is simply updated. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 text frame with the specified frame type is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        encoding - the character set used to encode the text. Only ISO 8859-1 and UTF-16 are allowed.
        text - the text to be added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        frameType - the type of ID3v2.4 text frame to add.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 text frame that was added/updated.

      • setV24UnsynchronizedLyrics

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24UnsynchronizedLyrics(Language language,
                                     java.lang.String lyrics)
        adds an ID3v2.4 unsynchronized lyrics frame with the specified song lyrics written in the given language to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 unsynchronized lyrics frame with the lyrics in the specified language, then the existing frame's unsynchronized lyrics are simply updated with the new lyrics. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 unsynchronized lyrics frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag. The lyrics are encoded with the UTF-16 character set.
        Parameters:
        language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the song lyrics are written in.
        lyrics - the unsynchronized lyrics to the song.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 synchronized lyrics frame that was added/updated.

      • removeV24UnsynchronizedLyrics

        protected ID3v24Frame removeV24UnsynchronizedLyrics(Language language)
        removes the ID3v2.4 unsynchronized lyrics frame written in the specified language from the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the unsynchronized song lyrics are written in.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 unsynchronized lyrics frame written in the specified language that was removed from the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag does not contain an ID3v2.4 unsynchronized lyrics frame in the specified language, then null is returned.

      • getV24Year

        public int getV24Year()
        finds the ID3v2.4 FrameType.RECORDING_TIME text frame in the ID3v2.4 tag and retrieves the text field. The text field is then converted to an integer and returned.
        Returns:
        the text field found in the ID3v2.4 FrameType.RECORDING_TIME text frame. If no ID3v2.4 FrameType.RECORDING_TIME text frame is found in the ID3v2.4 tag, or if the text field is not a valid integer, then 0 is returned.

      • setV24Year

        protected ID3v24Frame setV24Year(int year)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        adds an ID3v2.4 FrameType.RECORDING_TIME text frame with the specified year to the ID3v2.4 tag. If the ID3v2.4 tag already contains an ID3v2.4 FrameType.RECORDING_TIME text frame, then the existing frame's text is simply updated. Otherwise, a new ID3v2.4 FrameType.RECORDING_TIME text frame is added to the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Parameters:
        year - the year the song was recorded. It must be >= 1.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 FrameType.RECORDING_TIME text frame that was added/updated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the year is less than 0.

      • removeV24Year

        protected ID3v24Frame removeV24Year()
        removes the ID3v2.4 FrameType.RECORDING_TIME text frame in the ID3v2.4 tag.
        Returns:
        the ID3v2.4 FrameType.RECORDING_TIME text frame that was removed. If the ID3v2.4 tag does not contain an ID3v2.4 FrameType.RECORDING_TIME text frame, then no frame is removed and null is returned.
